q_en: I am an Advanced Sewer. Please transfer all cutting tasks that started between May 1, 2024, and May 30, 2024, to Premier Sewers.
hint: The ID of Advanced Sewers is 8, and the ID of Premier Sewers is 9. Update the database according to the time requirements described

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Advanced Sewer';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "Advanced Sewer"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'cut';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group with the name "cut"

steps.sql: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "Advanced Sewer"
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting task IDs that started between May 1, 2024, and May 30, 2024

steps.sql: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group with the name "cut"
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting task IDs that started between May 1, 2024, and May 30, 2024
steps.results: (1064, 'You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near \'Retrieve the working group ID for the working group with the name "cut"\' at line 1')

steps.sql: UPDATE cutting_tasks SET working_group_id = 'Advanced Sewer' WHERE id IN (<cutting_task_ids>);
steps.description: Update the customer ID for the retrieved cutting tasks to the ID of the customer "Premier Sewers"
